congVote.result: The bill (S. 1890), as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By a unanimous vote of 87 yeas (Vote No. 39), Senate passed S. 1890, to amend chapter 90 of title 18, United States Code, to provide Federal jurisdiction for the theft of trade secrets, after agreeing to the committee amendment in the nature of a substitute.
